messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Fwd: Junk band music
messages.msgSnippet: Those pages are cool.  It would take an hour to look all around the Noisy Toys site. I ve added those links to my music page.  They re down below the Encore
messages.messageBody:
Those pages are cool. It would take an hour to look all around the
Noisy Toys site.

I've added those links to my music page. They're down below the
Encore cards here:
http://sandradodd.com/music

Sandra

messages.subject: Fwd: Junk band music
messages.msgSnippet: My dad sent this to me, and it was so cool I wanted to forward it on. For all those who are into art, music, selling, recycling, inventing, countless other
messages.messageBody:
My dad sent this to me, and it was so cool I wanted to forward it on.
For all those who are into art, music, selling, recycling, inventing,
countless other passions, including just noise. I must say, he's
catching on to this unschooling bit ;-) Once he grokked the
fullness, it seemed to make more sense to him. now he just forwards
everything to me, and since he's retired and always online, he finds
lots of cool stuff. He's kind of an unschooler himself. He's really
into making flutes right now.
Melissa
Mom to Josh (11), Breanna (8), Emily (7), Rachel (6), Sam (4), Dan
(2), and Avari Rose


Begin forwarded message:

>
> Hello Melissa
> In my search for some answers I ran across these very cool music
> pages And was just sure you need to see them . It Could make for an
> exciting day , week , year . See these great idea starters . . .
>
> http://www.tidewater.net/~xylojim/childrensmuseum.html
>
> http://www.noisytoys.com/interviews/interview10.html
>
> http://www.ncusd203.org/prairie/Mrs.%20Hill/InventedInstruments.html
>
> ANd if you're wondering just how long to cut them , here is a site
> that can tell you that . . . http://www.windworld.com/tools/
> freebar/index.html
> I would use cm just for exactness . . . but it will figure it for
> what ever measure you wish to use .

> Anyways . . . I thought those websites were inspirational & could
> be done with junk on hand or findable . Either way , have a good
> time with them & have a wonderful day .
> Love always . . . Dad
>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
